articles.title: Indian and Chinese troops fight with sticks and bricks in video - CNN
articles.description: Video of what appears to be a previously unreported violent clash between Indian and Chinese troops at their disputed Himalayan border has emerged online, offering a rare window into the long-simmering territorial tensions between the two Asian powers.
